PatientDetails.Name: Joanna Sprague
HospitalCourse: Admitted to the intensive care unit due to NSTEMI complicated by cardiogenic shock on 09/19/2024.
Underwent emergency PTCA with stent placement and subsequent Impella insertion.
Complicated by respiratory failure requiring intubation and mechanical ventilation.
Extubated and re-intubated due to poor secretion management.
Underwent multiple assessments for cardiac management and infection control.

Medications: Dual antiplatelet therapy with aspirin and ticagrelor
ElectronicMedicalRecords.HospitalDischarge: Discharged on 10/05/2024 after improvement but with ongoing care needs.

Sepsis.ClinicalNotes: Developed fevers and leukocytosis concerning for infection without a known source.

BloodProducts.TransfusionEvents: Transfused one unit of packed cells to maintain hemoglobin above 8 g/dL.
